contains the Django view’s functions related to lettings models

exception DoesNotExist¶

Bases: ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Bases: MultipleObjectsReturned

address¶

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a one-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Restaurant(Model):
    place = OneToOneField(Place, related_name='restaurant')

Restaurant.place is a ForwardOneToOneDescriptor instance.

address_id¶
id¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

objects = <django.db.models.manager.Manager object>¶
title¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

lettings.views.capture_exception(error: BaseException | ExcInfo | None = None, scope: Any | None = None, **scope_kwargs: Any) → str | None[source]¶

Alias for sentry_sdk.Scope.capture_exception()

Captures an exception.

Parameters:

  • error – An exception to capture. If None, sys.exc_info() will be used.

  • scope – An optional sentry_sdk.Scope to apply to events. The scope and scope_kwargs parameters are mutually exclusive.

  • scope_kwargs – Optional data to apply to event. For supported **scope_kwargs see sentry_sdk.Scope.update_from_kwargs(). The scope and scope_kwargs parameters are mutually exclusive.

Returns:

An event_id if the SDK decided to send the event (see sentry_sdk.client._Client.capture_event()).

profiles.views.capture_exception(error: BaseException | ExcInfo | None = None, scope: Any | None = None, **scope_kwargs: Any) → str | None[source]¶

Alias for sentry_sdk.Scope.capture_exception()

Captures an exception.

Parameters:

  • error – An exception to capture. If None, sys.exc_info() will be used.

  • scope – An optional sentry_sdk.Scope to apply to events. The scope and scope_kwargs parameters are mutually exclusive.

  • scope_kwargs – Optional data to apply to event. For supported **scope_kwargs see sentry_sdk.Scope.update_from_kwargs(). The scope and scope_kwargs parameters are mutually exclusive.

Returns:

An event_id if the SDK decided to send the event (see sentry_sdk.client._Client.capture_event()).

3. General views¶

oc_lettings_site/views.py

Contains the Django view’s functions related to oc_lettings_site app (Home page and 404 and 500 error pages)
